Godly Sword System.Title: Godly Sword System
Godly Sword System.Description: In a world dominated by demons and beasts, where every monster hungers for human flesh and blood, humans struggle to survive.A man named Yang Qi accidentally obtained the Sword Drawing System and a supernatural technique: Unlimited Sword Draw.Can he survive this hell and forge his own legend to become humanitys last salvation?
Godly Sword System.Chapter 43:
“Yang Qi, how are you?”

Su Kun quickly supported Yang Qi.

Yang Qi was currently very weak because he had completely exhausted the Essence Energy in his body.

“I’m fine. I’ll be fine after resting for a while.”

Yang Qi said.

All the Thunder Snake Martial School students in the square looked at Yang Qi in a state of shock.

They had clearly seen the battle between Yang Qi and Master Lin Tianzheng.

Yang Qi could actually fight with a Grandmaster!

They had never heard of such a proud son of heaven.

With that, Yang Qi returned to his room with the help of Master Su Kun.

Yang Qi had a rest on his bed the moment he got back to his room and the Essence Energy in his body started to slowly recover.

However, his Essence Energy recovery speed was not very fast.

In the Master’s Room.

Su Kun, the two Deputy Hall Masters, and all the Martial Masters were inside, spotting solemn expressions.

“Master, what is Yang Qi’s identity? He actually has Lord Xu Mu’s Three Star Taotie Badge?”

“I don’t know either, I just met him in Jiang City.”

Su Kun shook his head. He had been completely shocked by Yang Qi taking out the three-star Taotie Badge.

“I want to tell you something, but you may find it unbelievable if you hear it.”

A few seconds later, Su Kun looked at the people in the hall and said.

The crowd inside the hall froze, thinking that even such an incredible thing as Yang Qi having Lord Xu Mu’s three-star Taotie Badge was known to them, could there be something more incredible than that?

Everyone looked at Master Su Kun, wanting to know what kind of unbelievable thing it was.

Su Kun pondered for a few seconds, and then said:

“When Yang Qi and Lin Tianzheng were fighting just now, he used the Shadow Fist of the Demonic Wolf. You all should have seen it, right?”

“I saw it, this doesn’t seem too unbelievable, does it?”

The faculty members were puzzled. They knew that Yang Qi had extraordinary talent, and that he would be able to quickly comprehend the Earth Level Martial Skill – Shadow Fist of the Demonic Wolf. This wouldn’t surprise them too much.

“Master, do you want to tell us that Yang Qi spent a very short amount of time to comprehend the Shadow Fist of the Demonic Wolf?”

A Deputy Hall Master asked while looking at Master Su Kun.

“Yes. I wanted to tell you that Yang Qi spent a short time comprehending the Shadow Fist of the Demonic Wolf, but do you know how short this time is?”

“How short is this period of time?”

The faculty members looked at Su Kun with anticipation.

“He just took a glance, and then he understood it.”

Su Kun said as he scanned the crowd.

He only took one glance at it!

He had already comprehended it?

Everyone in the hall was stunned.

“Master, you don’t want to liven up the atmosphere, do you?”

“Does it look like I’m livening things up to you?”

The faculty members gulped while thinking of how Yang Qi had comprehended the Earth Level Martial Skill – Shadow Fist of the Demonic Wolf with just a glance.

How was this possible?

“Although I also find it unbelievable, it’s the truth, I’m afraid that Yang Qi’s talent is a rare existence in the entire world!”

Su Kun said.

Everyone in the hall looked at each other in disbelief. They thought that if this was really the case, then Yang Qi could no longer be described as terrifying.

He should be described as extremely terrifying!

On the other side.

Outside the Thunder Snake Martial School.

A man wearing a golden mask stood near the entrance.

The man exuded a domineering aura, causing the surrounding people to not dare approach him.

It was as if this man was the unparalleled Warlord who soared in the sky!

If the man wasn’t wearing a golden mask, then everyone around him would be extremely shocked. It was because the man was none other than the most powerful Martial Artist in the Linhai Base.

He was Senior Grandmaster Xu Mu!

+++

Godly Sword System.Chapter 47:
Su Kun looked at the combat strength of the Testing Instrument and rubbed his eyes.

“Yang Qi, were you the one who hit this?”

“En.”

Yang Qi nodded.

Su Kun looked at Yang Qi as if he was looking at a devil.

“Yang Qi, do you mean that you are not a Primary Martial Master, but an Intermediate Martial Master?”

“Yes, Master.”

Su Kun stared blankly at Yang Qi as he thought about what kind of monstrous genius was standing in front of him.

There were many Primary Body Tempering Martial Artists who found it difficult to reach the Intermediate Body Tempering Martial Artist realm.

But Yang Qi had broken through to the Intermediate Martial Master in just a few days?

Furthermore…

Su Kun suddenly thought of something. He then recalled the battle between Yang Qi and Lin Tianzheng. Huang Zhan seemed to have mentioned the Spiritual Body and the Combined Level One.

Spiritual Body, Combined Level One?

In other words, Yang Qi possessed a physique that the entire Linhai Base did not have, a Spiritual Body?

An Intermediate Martial Master had 20 000 combat strength!

An Intermediate Martial Master with a Spiritual Body had 40 000 combat strength!

Did Yang Qi now have 40 000 combat strength?

Su Kun couldn’t help but shiver after thinking of this. He couldn’t understand why there was such a genius like Yang Qi in this world.

“Master, is there something you wanted to see me about??”

Yang Qi looked at Su Kun with a puzzled expression.

Su Kun only remembered why he came here when he heard this.

“Yang Qi, Lord Xu Mu, asked you to go to the Linhai Council.”

Yang Qi was stunned, he didn’t expect Su Kun to say something like this.

After coming back to his senses, Yang Qi thought that it was also time to make a trip to the Linhai Council.

Yang Qi left the Thunder Snake Martial School and walked towards the Linhai Council.

Linhai Council.

Yang Qi arrived outside the Linhai Council.

After observing the Linhai Council, he found it worthy of being the largest authority in Linhai Base. Its appearance was incomparably domineering!

Outside the Linhai Council gate stood a few Martial Artists on guard. These Martial Artists were only at the Martial Disciple Level.

But everyone knows that even with a few newborn babies guarding the gates of the Linhai Council, no one would dare break in.

Yang Qi walked to the entrance of the Linhai Council but was stopped by the Martial Disciple Level guards.

“Stop right there! This is the Parliament of Linhai, not just anyone can enter!”

These group of Martial Disciples had unfriendly expressions on their faces.

“I was invited by Lord Xu Mu.”

Yang Qi said.

“Lord Xu Mu invited you?”

The Martial Disciple guards were shocked, “So you’re saying that you have a three-star Taotie Badge?”

Yang Qi smiled, “Yes, I have a three-star Taotie Badge.”

Yang Qi then took out the Taotie Badge.

The Martial Disciple’s eyes widened when they saw the badge in Yang Qi’s hand.

“May I come in now?”

“Of course you can.”

Lord Xu Mu had already informed then that if they saw a person with his badge, then they should bring that person to him.

“Master, please follow me to see Lord Xu Mu.”

One Primary Martial Disciple replied respectfully to Yang Qi.

After saying that, this Primary Martial Disciple brought Yang Qi to a place.

A moment later, Yang Qi arrived outside a grand hall.

“Master, Lord Xu Mu is inside.”

The Primary Martial Disciple naturally didn’t dare to go in. He bowed to Yang Qi, then turned around and left.

Yang Qi looked at the grand hall in front of him and then walked in.

After he walked into the hall, he felt a sense of danger rushing towards him!

He looked at the people in the hall and was secretly shocked.

Grandmaster…

They were all Grandmasters!

+++

Godly Sword System.Chapter 46:
Grandmaster Xu Mu didn’t stay in Thunder Snake Martial School for long before leaving.

The next day, the Essence Energy in Yang Qi’s body had fully recovered.

Yang Qi already expected that he’ll be back in top shape after a good day’s rest.

He secretly sneered as he thought of the recent events.

He would find Lin Tianzheng and Huang Zhan sooner or later!

What he needed to do now was to draw his sabre!

After that, he drew the Red Fire Prisoner Bull Blade from the scabbard behind him.

“754 times.”

“755 times.”

“756 times.”

The Sword Draw Martial Skill increased his sabre drawing speed by tenfold!

It made Yang Qi’s drawing speed so fast that it left afterimages in its wake.

Not only could he obtain slash points by drawing his blade, but he could also increase his combat strength!

His combat strength kept increasing as he continued to crazily draw his sabre.

Ten days later!

“10 000 times.”

Within ten days, Yang Qi had successfully drawn his sabre 10,000 times.

He then decided to go test out his current combat strength.

When he arrived in front of the Strength Testing Instrument, he punched out.

25,000 combat strength!

Yang Qi’s combat strength appeared on the Strength Testing Instrument.

Yang Qi nodded his head in satisfaction.

After that, he stopped using the Spiritual Body’s strength enhancement and Instead punched the Strength Testing Instrument with his normal strength.

15000 Combat Strength!

Without using the Spiritual Body’s strength enhancement, he needed an extra 5000 Combat Strength to reach the power of an Intermediate Martial Master.

“Slash Point + 10.”

“Slash Point + 10.”

“Slash Point + 10.”

Yang Qi continued to draw his sabre!

“Ding! Host has obtained a treasure chest.”

The system’s voice suddenly sounded in his mind.

Treasure chest?

Yang Qi then opened the treasure chest he had just obtained without any hesitation.

“Heaven Grade Speed Martial Skill, Super Slash Arts.”

Super Slash Arts?

Yang Qi was startled and quickly checked the function of the Super Slash Arts.

Super Slash Arts: Increases the speed of drawing a blade by a hundred times!

Hundred times sabre drawing speed!

Yang Qi’s face was filled with excitement. The Sword Draw with ten times the speed was already very terrifying, now that the speed was 100 times…

Without a doubt, he had mastered the Super Slash Arts.

“10 001 times.”

“10 002 times.”

“10 003 times.”

Yang Qi continued drawing his sabre.

The Sword Draw and Super Slash Arts were martial skills that increased his speed. In other words, his speed would continue increasing if he continued to draw his sabre.

“10 010 times.”

“10 030 times.”

“10 050 times.”

Yang Qi’s hand speed was so fast that it could no longer be seen with the naked eye.

“10 070 times.”

“10 090 times.”

“10 100 times.”

He drew his sabre at lightning speed.

“10 500 times.”

“10 510 times.”

“10 520 times.”

One may only see Yang Qi drawing his sabre once, but he had in fact drew in 20 times.

In just two days

Yang Qi had successfully drawn his sabre twenty thousand times!

20 000/100 000.

He was still eighty thousand times away from the second stage of “Drawing out Sword Millions of Times.”

And his combat strength…

Yang Qi walked to the front of the Strength Testing Instrument.

He took a deep breath and threw a punch!

40 000 combat strength!

Could it be that I have already broken through?

Yang Qi was secretly shocked.

He withdrew the Spiritual Body’s enhancement and the Power of the Demonic Wolf, then once again threw a punch at the Testing Instrument.

20 000 combat strength!

He had indeed broken through.

20 000 combat strength was already the combat strength of an Intermediate Martial Master.

Yang Qi’s face was delighted as he thought of how amazing the Spiritual Body was because an ordinary Intermediate Martial Master only had 20 000 combat strength, but he had 40 000 combat strength.

“Yang Qi! Yang Qi!”

Master Su Kun’s voice suddenly sounded beside Yang Qi’s ear.

He turned around and saw Master running over with excitement.

Yang Qi was a little puzzled by this and thought what exciting thing would cause the Master to actually run over.

Su Kun ran to Yang Qi’s side with excitement. Then, just as he was about to speak, he saw the combat strength on the Testing Instrument.

20 000 combat strength!

+++

Godly Sword System.Chapter 48:
Yang Qi knew that these martial grandmasters were members of the Linhai Council.

Twelve martial grandmasters!

One Senior Grandmaster, four Intermediate Grandmasters, and seven Beginner Martial Grandmasters!

Apart from Xu Mu, the rest of the members were all clan heads of the major families in Linhai Base.

When Yang Qi walked into the main hall, all the Martial Grandmasters turned to look at him.

“Yang Qi, you’re here.”

Xu Mu sat on the throne right above the main hall and said to Yang Qi.

“Yes, Lord Xu Mu.”

Yang Qi replied.

“Lord Xu Mu, is he the new Linhai Council member?” An Intermediate Grandmaster looked at Xu Mu with a puzzled expression.

“That’s right.” Xu Mu nodded his head.

All the Martial Grandmasters looked at Yang Qi. Xu Mu had previously told them that this new member wasn’t a Martial Grandmaster, but a Primary Martial Master.

They were curious at that time, but Xu Mu only gave them a mysterious smile and said that they would know when the time came.

They looked at Yang Qi for a moment and found that apart from being very young, Yang Qi had nothing extraordinary about him.

“Lord Xu Mu, I don’t think he is outstanding.”

An Intermediate Grandmaster looked at Xu Mu with a puzzled expression.

“He doesn’t have anything special about him?”

Xu Mu smiled then looked at Yang Qi and said, “Yang Qi, show us your extraordinary abilities.”

When Yang Qi heard this, he was about to pull out the Red Fire Prisoner Bull Blade on his back, but he was interrupted by a voice before he could continue.

“Wait!”

An Intermediate Grandmaster looked at Yang Qi and said, “Lord Xu Mu said that you are a Primary Martial Master, but I don’t believe it. After all, with your age, you could at most be an intermediate Martial Disciple, right?”

The young Martial Artist with the strongest talent in the Linhai Base was only an intermediate Martial Disciple.

The Intermediate Grandmaster then looked at Xu Mu again and said, “Lord Xu Mu, can you let him test his realm first?”

“Sure.”

Xu Mu nodded.

After a while, a few Martial Artists carried a Strength Testing Instrument to the main hall.

“Please.”

The Intermediate Grandmaster made an inviting gesture to Yang Qi.

All the grandmasters in the hall looked at Yang Qi with curiosity because they too wanted to know if Yang Qi was really a Primary Martial Master.

Yang Qi raised his fist while looking straight at the Strength Testing Instrument. He then threw out a punch suddenly!

20 000 combat strength!

The Grandmasters in the hall looked at the numbers on the Strength Testing Instrument and were all stunned!

20 000 combat strength?!

Intermediate Martial Master?

How could this be…

All the Martial Grandmasters were stunned. They didn’t even believe that Yang Qi was a Primary Martial Master. But now, the strength Testing Instrument was showing the combat strength of an Intermediate Martial Master!

Xu Mu, who was sitting on the throne, was also shocked.

When he first saw Yang Qi, Yang Qi was still a Primary Martial Master. In just a dozen days, he had become an Intermediate Martial Master?

He already knew that Yang Qi could increase his combat strength by drawing his sabre…

However, Xu Mu never expected Yang Qi’s combat strength to increase so quickly.

That’s right!

Yang Qi still had a Spiritual Body!

Thinking of this, Xu Mu slowly said to Yang Qi:

“Not enough!”

All the martial grandmasters were stunned. They didn’t understand what Lord Xu Mu meant.

Yang Qi, on the other hand, understood. He then raised his fist once again and took a deep breath and proceeded to throw a powerful punch at the Testing Instrument in front of him.

40 000 Combat Strength!

The Grandmasters in the hall watched as the numbers on the Strength Testing Instrument changed, and they were all flabbergasted.

40 000 Combat Strength?

Yang Qi wasn’t an Intermediate Martial Master, but a Senior Martial Master?

The Grandmasters looked at each other for a while. In Linhai Base, the most powerful young martial artist was only an Intermediate Martial Disciple, but Yang Qi was actually a Senior Martial Master?

All the Martial Grandmasters’ doubts about Yang Qi disappeared when they saw the numbers on the Testing Instrument.

The lowest combat strength of a Senior Martial Master was 30 000, which was equivalent to a Third Grade Power of the Demonic Wolf. Now, 40 000 combat strength had appeared on the Strength Testing Instrument…

In other words, Yang Qi was advancing towards being a Primary Grandmaster!

+++

Godly Sword System.Chapter 50:
“By the way, Lord Xu Mu, why did you ask me to come to the Linhai Council?”

Yang Qi looked at Xu Mu with a puzzled expression.

“Let’s talk as we walk.”

Xu Mu then stood up from his throne and walked towards the main hall.

Yang Qi also followed him.

Xu Mu spoke to Yang Qi after leaving the main hall.

“River City has been attacked by Demonic Devils, and there are countless casualties. So let’s go there and take a look.”

Yang Qi was secretly surprised. Why would Lord Xu Mu go there personally?

Xu Mu seemed to have noticed Yang Qi’s doubt. He smiled and said, “Yang Qi, I just want to see your combat ability.”

Yang Qi understood what he meant.

River City.

Three days ago, River City was attacked by Demonic Devils. The Martial Artists, the army, and countless residents were killed!

The streets were filled with rivers of blood, and corpses piled up like a mountain!

Everyone was in danger!

The Demonic Devils came too quickly, and the residents just did not have time to retreat.

River City and Jiang City were about the same size, and the number of Martial Artists and soldiers was just too few. They were simply no match for the Demonic Devils.

Yang Qi and Xu Mu had just arrived outside River City!

They then heard the terrifying roars of the Demonic Devils.

Roar!

Immediately after that, heart-wrenching screams echoed in their ears.

“Let’s go in.”

Xu Mu said.

The two of them walked into River City.

They met more than a dozen Primary Demon Soldiers as soon as they entered River City!

“Hehe, humans!”

The group of Primary Demon Soldiers smiled coldly at Yang Qi and Xu Mu.

In their eyes, Yang Qi and Xu Mu were destined to be killed by them.

“Yang Qi, you go and deal with them.”

“Alright.”

Yang Qi responded and drew the Red Fire Prisoner Bull Blade.

“Slash Point + 10.”

He stared at the group of Primary Demon Soldiers in front of him and shouted, “All of you, go to hell!”

Yang Qi slashed down with the Red Fire Prisoner Bull Blade in his hand.

Swoosh!

A terrifying sabre light swept out instantly!

The group of Primary Demon Soldiers were shocked. They never expected Yang Qi to be a Martial Artist, but he also happened to be a very powerful one at that.

Puff!

The bodies of the Primary Demon Soldier group were all separated from the middle. Their corpses were too horrible to look at!

“Killing 15 Primary Demon Soldier, Slash Points + 4500.”

The system’s voice sounded in Yang Qi’s mind.

Xu Mu looked at Yang Qi’s attack and nodded his head in satisfaction.

Although the group of Primary Demon Soldiers were weak, some young Martial Artists were still afraid of them. Flowers in a greenhouse could sometimes cause disasters.

“Let’s clear the Demonic Devils in River City separately.” Xu Mu slowly said.

Xu Mu then walked towards a direction after saying that.

When Yang Qi heard him, he put the Red Fire Prisoner Bull Blade into the sheath on his back.

Boom!

A terrifying explosion resounded!

Yang Qi quickly walked over.

“There are too many Demonic Devils. We can’t hold on any longer!”

“Even if we can’t hold on, we still have to hold on!”

“I don’t want to die!”

An angry voice, a despairing voice, and a sobbing voice suddenly sounded in Yang Qi’s ears.

Yang Qi looked at the hundreds of people in front of him. They were all soldiers and were using guns to continuously shoot at the Demonic Devils that were charging at them!

There were over a hundred Demonic Devils attacking!

Although these group of Demonic Devils were all Primary Demon Soldiers, they still had an absolute advantage against the several hundred human soldiers. After all, the Demonic Devil’s defence was too strong and no one could tell how many bullets were needed to kill one.

The hundred or so Primary Demon Soldiers had broken through the defence line, while sustaining minimal casualties!

And these Primary Demon Soldiers had already arrived in front of the several hundred human soldiers.

“Hehe, humans, you’re all going to die!”

The human soldiers’ faces were filled with despair.

They knew that there was no longer any possibility of survival.

Suddenly, a ray of light that was dozens of meters long slashed over.

+++

Godly Sword System.Chapter 45:
Su Xun’er ran to the main room in one breath.

“Dad!”

Su Kun and the faculty members were in the middle of discussing Yang Qi’s issue, but they all stopped and looked over when they heard Su Xun’er’s voice.

When they looked at Su Xun’er, they discovered that her face was filled with shock!

“Xu’er, what happened to you?” Su Kun asked while looking at Su Xun’er in confusion.

“Grandmaster Xu Mu is here!” Su Xun’er said in shock.

This…

Everyone in the room winced and were tongue-tied.

“Xu’er, what did you say?”

“Grandmaster Xu Mu is here, and he’s currently in Yang Qi’s room!”

Su Xun’er said again, with excitement.

When Master Su Kun heard her, his whole body was drenched in cold sweat.

“Xu’er, you are not joking, right?”

“No, Grandmaster Xu Mu really came!”

The faculty members looked at each other in shock.

Yang Qi had Lord Xu Mu’s three-star Taotie Badge, which proved that the relationship between the two was not simple. It was actually possible for Lord Xu Mu to come visit Yang Qi.

They were all stunned when they thought of this.

“Master, what should we do now?”

The faculty members looked at Su Kun.

“Of course we are going to see Lord Xu Mu!”

A joyful expression suddenly appeared on Su Kun’s face.

Yang Qi and Lord Xu Mu had a very good relationship, and Yang Qi was the Thunder Snake Martial School’s Super Student. This relationship was enough to increase the status of Thunder Snake Martial School by heaps and bounds.

After that, Su Kun and the other faculty members ran to Yang Qi’s room.

Along the way, all the students of Thunder Snake Martial School were puzzled when they saw the influential figures of their school running in panic.

They arrived outside Yang Qi’s room a few moments later.

The door to Yang Qi’s room was currently open.

So when they saw the middle-aged man sitting by Yang Qi’s bed, their hearts suddenly constricted!

That was because the middle-aged man was really Grandmaster Xu Mu!

“Lord Xu Mu!”

Su Kun quickly walked into the room and respectfully called out to Xu Mu.

Xu Mu looked at Su Kun when he heard him and said, “You are Master Su Kun of Thunder Snake Martial School, right?”

“Yes, Lord Xu Mu.”

Su Kun nodded.

He was only a Primary Grandmaster, while Lord Xu Mu was a Senior Grandmaster. The gap between them was like an insurmountable mountain.

The other faculty members looked at Xu Mu in shock. In their eyes, he was an existence that they could only look up to.

“You should know that Yang Qi is one of the thirteen members of the Linhai Council. The Black Tiger Martial School and Tenglong Martial Arts School really don’t know what’s good for them!”

Xu Mu said to Su Kun and the others.

He had placed the fate of the Linhai Base on Yang Qi, so he was naturally unhappy now that Black Tiger Martial School and Tenglong Martial Arts School were looking for trouble with him.

However, he didn’t expect Su Kun and the rest of the people in front of him to freeze when they heard those words.

Yang Qi was one of the thirteen members of the Linhai Council?

They only knew that there was a new member in the Parliament of Linhai, but they never expected the new member to be Yang Qi.

If one wanted to enter the Parliament of Linhai, they would need to at least be a low rank martial grandmaster!

“What? Don’t you know that Yang Qi is one of the thirteen members of the Linhai Council?”

Xu Mu was also stunned.

He thought that Yang Qi had already told them about it.

After a few seconds of shock, Xu Mu then turned to Yang Qi and said…

“Yang Qi, do you need me to help you?”

Yang Qi shook his head, “Lord Xu Mu, I can handle the Black Tiger Martial School and Tenglong Martial Arts School myself.”

Xu Mu knew that Yang Qi only needed to draw his blade to increase his combat strength, so he understood that it wouldn’t take long for Yang Qi to get his revenge.

+++

Godly Sword System.Chapter 44:
Grandmaster Xu Mu stood outside the Thunder Snake Martial School entrance, ready to walk in!

Suddenly, a slightly puzzled voice sounded.

“May I ask why you are standing outside the Thunder Snake Martial School?”

Su Xun’er curiously looked at Grandmaster Xu Mu.

Xu Mu was currently wearing a golden mask, so she couldn’t recognize him.

“I heard the Thunder Snake Martial School’s Super Student fought Master Lin Tianzheng from the Black Tiger Martial School. I am his friend, so I came to see him.”

Xu Mu said.

Su Xun’er was stunned by this news and quickly asked, “You are Yang Qi’s friend?”

“Yes, can you bring me to see him?” Xu Mu nodded.

Su Xun’er heard this and gave Xu Mu a suspicious look because she could not understand why Xu Mu wore a golden mask. Could his face be disfigured?

Su Xun’er thought for a while before she brought Grandmaster Xu Mu into the Thunder Snake Martial School.

She didn’t care if Grandmaster Xu Mu was good or bad, this was the Thunder Snake Martial School!

Su Xun’er proceeded to take Xu Mu to Yang Qi’s room.

Once they arrived, Su Xun’er looked back at Xu Mu and said, “This is Yang Qi’s room.”

She then knocked on the door. “Yang Qi, It’s me.”

Not long after, a weak voice came from within.

“Come in.”

Su Xun’er pushed open the door and walked in with Grandmaster Xu Mu.

“Yang Qi, how are you?”

“I’m fine.”

Su Xun’er looked at Yang Qi’s face and found that there was nothing wrong with it other than being a little pale, so she secretly felt relieved.

“Oh right, Yang Qi, this person said he is your friend.”

“My friend?”

Yang Qi looked at the man wearing a golden mask beside Su Xun’er with a puzzled expression.

Yang Qi then said, “I don’t know him.”

“You don’t know him?”

Su Xun’er was shocked by this. She was about to question Grand Master Xu Mu, but before she could say anything, Grandmaster Xu Mu spoke up.

“What is it? You don’t know me anymore?”

Grandmaster Xu Mu said with a smile.

Yang Qi’s expression froze because this voice was so familiar to him!

In the next second, his pupils shrank.

“Lord Xu Mu!”

He didn’t expect that Grandmaster Xu Mu would personally come to Thunder Snake Martial School to find him.

“You said you didn’t know him.”

Su Xun’er muttered with displeasure.

But before she could finish her sentence, she then realised something!

Su Xun’er’s eyes widened as she looked at Yang Qi in shock, “Yang Qi, what did you just call him?”

“Lord Xu Mu.”

Yang Qi said.

Su Xun’er gulped and looked at the man wearing the golden mask beside her.

“Yang Qi, could it be?”

“That’s right, it’s Lord Xu Mu, the Grandmaster.”

Su Xun’er was stunned.

Grandmaster Xu Mu?

Xu Mu realised that Yang Qi had seen through his identity, so he took off the golden mask.

His face was revealed in front of Su Xun’er.

Of course, Su Xun’er knew Grandmaster Xu Mu’s appearance because she had seen it countless times in mission reports.

She also knew his identity. He was the guardian of Linhai Base and the hundred other cities under his jurisdiction.

When Su Xun’er saw that it was really Grandmaster Xu Mu, she took several steps backwards, her face full of shock.

Such a supreme existence, a god-like figure, had actually come to their Thunder Snake Martial School?

“Lord Xu Mu.”

After a long time, Su Xun’er finally called out to Xu Mu.

Xu Mu smiled gently.

Su Xun’er was stunned.

She did not expect Grandmaster Xu Mu to show such a gentle smile.

“Lord Xu Mu, I will tell my dad to come over now!”

Su Xun’er quickly ran out the moment she finished speaking.

+++

Godly Sword System.Chapter 49:
None of the Grandmasters had ever heard of such a young Senior Martial Master.

Their faces were filled with shock as they stared at Yang Qi, unable to speak for a long time.

Xu Mu looked at the shocked Grandmasters and smiled.

“Do you all think that Yang Qi is a Senior Martial Master?”

All the grandmasters were stunned and looked at Xu Mu with doubt.

With a combat strength of 40 000, he should be a Senior Martial Master!

A Primary Grandmaster possessed a first tier Bull Power, and a first tier Bull Power weighed 75 000 kg.

They knew that it was impossible for Yang Qi to be a Primary Grandmaster.

“What if I told you that Yang Qi is only an Intermediate Martial Master?”

“Intermediate Martial Master?”

The Grandmasters in the hall were stunned for a moment, then they understood what was going on.

“Lord Xu Mu, you mean Yang Qi has a Spiritual Body?”

“That’s right!”

Grandmaster Xu Mu said.

All the Martial Grandmasters looked at each other in surprise.

He was a genius!

One had to know that in the vast Linhai Base, there had never been a Martial Artist with a Spiritual Body before.

The Grandmasters finally understood why Lord Xu Mu said that it was not enough when Yang Qi attacked with his combat strength of 20 000 kg.

It turned out that he was an Intermediate Martial Master with a Spiritual Body!

“Do you think that’s all there is to Yang Qi?”

Xu Mu suddenly said.

The Grandmasters were shocked once more. Yang Qi having a Spiritual Body was enough to shock them to the extreme. Could he still have other terrifying aspects?

“Yang Qi, show them how extraordinary you are.”

“Alright.”

Yang Qi nodded.

Swoosh!

He drew the Red Fire Prisoner Bull Blade from his back.

“Slash Point + 10.”

“Slash Point + 10.”

“Slash Point + 10.”

The Super Slash Arts could increase the speed of the sabre drawing by a hundred times!

Within a few moments, Yang Qi’s hand speed had reached its limit!

In the main hall, terrifying sabre lights kept sweeping out.

The sound of the sabre also began to ring out incessantly!

All the Grandmasters were flabbergasted as they looked at the scene before them in disbelief.

“What kind of hand speed is this?”

“Combined Level One, this must be Combined Level One!”

A Senior Martial Disciple has 6000 kg combat strength!

In other words, he was only 2500 kg combat strength away from a Senior Martial Disciple?

Su Kun rubbed his eyes and felt that he had seen wrongly.

But no matter how he rubbed them, the result was the same.

4500 kg was still being displayed on the Strength Testing Instrument.

“The Chosen One! He is the Chosen One!”

Su Kun couldn’t help but exclaim, as he couldn’t believe it initially. He now knew that there was such a terrifying genius in the world.

“Yang Qi, from today onwards, you will be the Super Student of Thunder Snake Martial School!”

Although Yang Qi didn’t want to be a Super Student, it didn’t seem too bad.

Yang Qi could not help but feel excited when he thought that drawing his sabre would increase his combat strength. He could not wait to continue drawing the sabre.

“Master, I have something else to attend to. I’ll be leaving first.”

“Okay, okay.”

Su Kun nodded.
Godly Sword System.Chapter 19:
Su Xun’er felt that Yang Qi was being whimsical. Didn’t he know how high the threshold of the Combined Level One was?

Yang Qi had his own thoughts, but he did not have the ability.

The students in Elite Pavilion no longer dared to look down on Yang Qi. Since Yang Qi’s weapon produced a sabre light before, they felt that Yang Qi might be pretending to be weak.

The Black Iron Wolf Blade in Yang Qi’s hand did not shock them too much. After all, most of the Martial Artists in this world used all kinds of fancy weapons.

“1070 times.”

“1071 times.”

“1072 times. “

Yang Qi was still drawing his sabre.

Master’s Room.

Lin Mu rushed to the Master’s Room.

“Master.”

Lin Mu respectfully called out to Master Su Kun.

Su Kun, Great Hall Master of Thunder Snake Martial School, Primary Grandmaster realm!

Such a figure was extremely dazzling in front of Lin Mu’s tiny Primary Martial Master realm.

Su Kun put down the document in his hand and looked at Lin Mu. “It’s you, Lin Mu. Why are you looking for me?”

“Master, It’s like this. I suspect that someone in Elite Pavilion has reached the Combined Level One of Three Weapon Stages.”

What?

Combined Level One?

Su Kun was shocked.

“This is just my suspicion. He had just entered Elite Pavilion today. When he drew his blade, the entire Elite Pavilion was filled with whistling blade lights.”

Lin Mu was afraid that the Master wouldn’t believe him, so he continued.

This…

Su Kun started to ponder. Su Kun thought that if what Lin Mu said was true, then that person might really be a Combined Level One.

“What’s the name of that student?”

“Yang Qi.”

Yang Qi!

Su Kun’s pupils shrank.

Su Kun remembered that the person he met in Jiang City who he suspected to have an Elemental Body was also called Yang Qi. Su Kun had even told Xu’er that if Yang Qi came to Thunder Snake Martial School, she should personally to bring him to Elite Pavilion.

It was him…

Su Kun was secretly shocked. If Yang Qi had reached Combined Level One and also had an Elemental Body, he would undoubtedly be a super genius.

“Lin Mu, ask Yang Qi to come and see me.”

“Yes, Master.”

When Lin Mu walked to the door, Su Kun stopped him again.

“Remember, don’t tell anyone about our conversation just now.”

Su Kun thought that if this matter was exposed, all the major powers in Linhai Base would fight for Yang Qi. The Thunder Snake Martial School was just an intermediate power in the Linhai Base.

Lin Mu naturally understood the Master’s concerns.

Lin Mu quickly walked to the Elite Pavilion. When he got there, Yang Qi was still repeatedly drawing his sabre.

“Yang Qi, come out for a while.”

Yang Qi put the Black Iron Wolf Blade into the sheath on his back and walked out.

“Mr. Lin, what’s the matter?”

Yang Qi looked at Lin Mu with some doubt.

“The Master wants to see you.”

“The head of the school wants to see me?”

Yang Qi did not expect the Master to want to see him.

He had seen the Master once in Jiang City. It was a man with a majestic figure who made Yang Qi feel a sense of danger rushing towards him.

He couldn’t imagine how terrifying a Primary Grandmaster was right now.

Yang Qi and Lin Mu arrived at the Master’s Room.

“Master, Yang Qi has arrived.”

“I know, you can leave now.”

Master Su Kun’s dignified rang out.

Lin Mu left the Master’s Room and closed the door.

“Master, this is your pass for the Linhai Base.”

Yang Qi took out the pass.

A smile appeared on Su Kun’s face. Su Kun took the pass and said, “Yang Qi, tell me honestly. Do you have an Elemental Body, and have you also reached the Combined Level One of the Three Weapon Stages?”

Yang Qi was stunned, not understanding how the Master knew.

Then, Yang Qi felt relieved. He realized that Lin Mu must have told the Master about what happened in Elite Pavilion just now.
Godly Sword System.Chapter 18:
Su Xun’er looked at Yang Qi with disdain.

She thought Yang Qi was a Martial Artist of the Advanced Body Tempering Stage, but he was just a Primary Body Tempering Martial Artist.

All the elite students in Elite Pavilion shook their heads.

They also felt relieved.

Yang Qi was brought here by Su Xun’er. They knew Su Xun’er was Master’s daughter and thought that Yang Qi should be a relative of Master.

Lin Mu’s face darkened a little.

Yang Qi felt these contemptuous gazes, but he just wanted to quickly finish drawing the sabre 10 000 times.

He had successfully drawn his sword a thousand times already, and was only 9000 times away from reaching 10 000.

One had to know that after completing the 10,000th sabre draw, he would obtain a million Slash Points and also evolve the Earth Blade Talent into the Skyblade Talent, the Elemental Body into a Spiritual Body and the Black Iron Wolf Blade into a Qiuniu Sabre of Red Fire.

“Yang Qi, how about…?”

Su Xun’er was prepared to let Yang Qi leave Elite Pavilion and go to the Basic Training Hall. After all, that was the territory of their Primary Body Tempering Martial Artists.

But before she could finish speaking, Yang Qi had already walked to a corner of the Elite Pavilion. He began to repeatedly draw out his sabre and sheath it back.

“Slash Point + 5.”

“Slash Point + 5.”

” Slash Point + 5. “

The dozens of students in Elite Pavilion were all stunned.

They did not understand what Yang Qi was doing.

However, as Yang Qi drew his sabre, the Elite Pavilion was filled with whistling sabre lights!

“What’s with this sabre light?”

“Why do I feel like Yang Qi is a powerful Martial Artist?”

“Damn, this is too scary.”

The dozens of elite students were all shocked.

Lin Mu’s eyes widened. As a Primary Martial Master, he felt Yang Qi was not simple. He was definitely not simple!

“1030 times.”

“1031 times.”

” 1032 times. “

Yang Qi crazily advanced towards the 10,000 times as he drew his sabre.

However, he immediately stopped.

Because he noticed that there were all kinds of shocked, surprised, and complicated looks facing him.

He smiled bitterly to himself. How could he have forgotten that he was a Combined Level One?

When he reached Combined Level One, he could now control the sabre light.

After all, he was just a Primary Martial Disciple. It would be best if he didn’t expose himself. Who knew what kind of person was behind this group of elite students.

He felt that he should try his best to keep a low profile.

After a while, Yang Qi controlled the whistling sabre light. When he drew the sabre again, the sabre light was no longer there.

All the elite students in Elite Pavilion were stunned. They all blinked their eyes. Why did the sabre light disappear?

Could it be that they were mistaken?

No!

They felt that they were definitely not mistaken.

Su Xun’er was also somewhat frightened by the sabre light that Yang Qi drew out just now.

Because Yang Qi had peeked at her while bathing in Yellowstone Mountains, she would not have bothered with Yang Qi if not for her father extending an invitation to him.

But now, she actually felt that Yang Qi was somewhat mysterious. Could it be that the intermediate Demon General on the Yellowstone Mountain was really killed by him?

Su Xun’er shook her head and dispelled that ridiculous idea.

“All of you, cultivate well. I will go out for a while.”

Lin Mu suddenly said to the dozens of elite students.

Lin Mu then walked out of Elite Pavilion.

Yang Qi had been drawing out his sabre all this time, but now it no longer emits sabre light.

“1050 times.”

“1051 times.”

“1052 times.”

Su Xun’er looked at Yang Qi’s action of drawing the sabre and thought of something. Her fair face was slightly stunned.

“Yang Qi, you don’t want to use this to draw the knife to reach the Combined Level One, do you?”

Su Xun’er’s words made the dozens of students in Elite Pavilion come to a realization.

However, it was too difficult to reach the Combined Level One!

In the entire Linhai Base, only Lord Xu Mu had reached the Combined Level One.

Xu Mu, Senior Grandmaster.

He had once entered the Demonic Cave in Mangshan Mountain three times and killed a Senior Demon Lord!

He was the guardian of the Linhai Base and its hundred cities!
Godly Sword System.Chapter 17:
“Young man, are you a student of Thunder Snake Martial School?”

“Not yet. But I’m going to be a student here soon.”

The taxi driver was envious.

“Thunder Snake Martial School is one of the top ten martial arts schools in Linhai Base. It has more than ten thousand students. I also heard that the Master of the school is a Grandmaster realm martial artist!”

Yang Qi was also surprised. There were actually so many students in the Thunder Snake Martial School?

The taxi arrived outside the Thunder Snake Martial School.

It was a few dozen stories tall building. At the top of the building, there were four domineering words that read Thunder Snake Martial School, just like those high level office buildings in China.

Yang Qi entered the Thunder Snake Martial School.

After entering, he didn’t know where to go.

“I didn’t expect you to be so thick-skinned. In the end, you still came.”

An unhappy voice could be heard beside Yang Qi’s ear.

Yang Qi recognised Su Xun’er’s voice. He turned his head and saw her in front of him.

“Let’s go.”

Su Xun’er reluctantly said. She then walked away, and Yang Qi followed behind her.

Yang Qi arrived at a big square. The sight of thousands of students doing strength training greeted him. These students were not Martial Artists. After all, to become a Primary Body Tempering Martial Artist, one needs to have 250 kg of strength.

Furthermore, everyone could only start cultivating at the age of 15. How could it be so easy to become a Martial Artist?

Su Xun’er brought Yang Qi to a place called Elite Pavilion.

After entering Elite Pavilion, Yang Qi found dozens of students inside, all at the Intermediate Body Tempering stage.

Yang Qi was secretly surprised and thought the Elite Pavilion was too powerful. There were actually so many Intermediate Body Forging Martial Artists, and they looked to be the same age as him.

“These are the most elite group of students in our Thunder Snake Martial School. They are all Intermediate Body Forging Martial Artist warriors. Don’t provoke them for any reason, and don’t blame me for not warning you if you do.”

Su Xun’er looked at Yang Qi arrogantly as if she was showing off.

She secretly despised him. If it wasn’t for her father’s invitation, Yang Qi would never be qualified to enter this place.

All the students in Elite Pavilion looked over when they saw a newcomer.

“Newbies? Introduce yourself.”

A middle-aged man with a stern face said to Yang Qi.

Yang Qi nodded when he heard that. “Hello, everyone. My name is Yang Qi.”

“This is Teacher Lin Mu, a Primary Martial Master. We all call him Mr. Lin.”

“Yang Qi, may I ask if you are an Intermediate Body Tempering Martial Artist?”

Lin Mu looked at Yang Qi.

There were twelve thousand students in the Thunder Snake Martial School. If one wanted to enter the Elite Pavilion, he had to be an Intermediate Body Tempering Martial Artist, and he must not be older than eighteen years old.

Su Xun’er, the number one genius in the Thunder Snake Martial School, became an Advanced Body Tempering Martial Artist at the age of 17.

“I’m not an Intermediate Body Tempering Martial Artist.”

Yang Qi said.

All the students in Elite Pavilion were stunned.

He wasn’t an Intermediate Body Tempering Martial Artist?

The lowest requirement in Elite Pavilion was an Intermediate Body Forging Martial Artist.

Could Yang Qi be at the Advanced Body Tempering Stage?

All the students thought this way. They felt that Yang Qi might very well be a genius like Su Xun’er.

Su Xun’er was also stunned. She looked at Yang Qi and thought, “Yang Qi is actually an Advanced Body Tempering Martial Artist? No wonder, her father gave him the pass to Linhai Base.”

“Then you are you an Advanced Body Tempering Martial Artist?”

Lin Mu’s tone softened. A Martial Artist of the Advanced Body Tempering Stage, coupled with Yang Qi’s current age, could be considered a true genius in Linhai Base.

“I’m not an Advanced Body Tempering Martial Artist.”

Yang Qi shook his head.

All the elite students in Elite Pavilion were dumbfounded.

Primary Body Tempering Martial Artist?

But how could a Primary Body Tempering Martial Artist enter the Elite Pavilion?

They wouldn’t even imagine Yang Qi being a Martial Disciple. After all, those who reached the Martial Disciple realm before the age of twenty were undoubtedly the super geniuses amongst the super geniuses.
Godly Sword System.Chapter 16:
Su Xun’er felt shocked. She turned around and the expression on her face froze.

“Dad…”

A middle-aged man in his forties walked over.

Yang Qi looked at the middle-aged man and found that he looked very dignified. He had sharp eyebrows and a pair of large leopard-like eyes.

Furthermore, he could feel a strong sense of danger from him!

Martial Master? Grandmaster?

Yang Qi knew that if he were to face this middle-aged man, he would have no chance of winning.

The man snorted and looked at Su Xun’er.

This man was Su Xun’er’s father, Su Kun.

“I told you not to train outside, but you just didn’t listen! See how I will deal with you once we get back!”

Su Kun had just finished speaking when he eventually noticed Yang Qi.

He carefully observed Yang Qi. After a while, Su Kun was a little surprised. He found that Yang Qi seemed different from the other Martial Artists. His constitution also seemed extraordinary.

Could Yang Qi have an Elemental Body?

“What’s your name?”

“My name is Yang Qi.”

Yang Qi said.

“My name is Su Kun. I am the Thunder Snake Martial School Master of Linhai Base. You can join my Thunder Snake Martial School if you are interested.”

After saying that, Su Kun took out a token and handed it to Yang Qi.

Yang Qi looked at the token in Su Kun’s hand and could not help but be shocked. A pass from the Linhai Base?

Grandmaster!

He knew that one must be a Grandmaster realm expert to be able to obtain a pass to Linhai Base.

Yang Qi was very shocked. There was actually a Grandmaster expert standing in front of him.

A Grandmaster could not be insulted!

He couldn’t remember how many times he had seen this sentence in web novels.

“Dad, why did you give him the pass? You don’t know, just now he secretly…”

Su Xun’er blushed and did not dare to continue.

Yang Qi did not refuse. He took the pass from Su Kun. He would have to leave Jiang City sooner or later.

“Thunder Snake Martial School is looking forward to your arrival.”

After saying that, Su Kun pulled Su Xun’er and left.

Su Xun’er did not understand. She turned her head and looked at Yang Qi in confusion. She thought that Yang Qi was just an ordinary person. Why would her father give him the pass?

Could he be a genius?

Yang Qi returned to the Jiang City council and gave some instructions before leaving the next day.

There was still a long distance between the Jiang City and the Linhai Base. It would take him two days to arrive there.

If an outsider wanted to obtain the right to live in the Linhai Base, they had to be a Martial Artist. Two days later, Yang Qi finally arrived at the city gate of the base.

“Stop right there, please show me your identity.”

A few soldiers stopped Yang Qi and questioned him.

Yang Qi understood. The identity information of a Martial Artist was different from that of an ordinary person. He never received his own Martial Artist certificate in Jiang City.

Fortunately, he had the pass.

After searching for a while, he took out the pass and handed it to a soldier.

The soldier took the pass and was shocked.

All the soldiers outside the city gates of Linhai Base were also stunned.

The pass to Linhai Base?!

This was a token that could only be possessed by a Grandmaster realm Martial Artist.

This person actually had the support of a Grandmaster expert?

“Please come in.”

The soldier quickly returned the pass to Yang Qi and respectfully said to him.

Yang Qi put away the pass and walked into the city.

There were eight bases in the Dragon Country, and Linhai Base was one of them. A city with tens of millions of people was an important line of defence against the Demonic Devils.

When he walked into the Linhai Base, he found that it was bustling with activity.

Before Su Kun left, he told him that he was the Thunder Snake Martial School Master.

Yang Qi stopped a taxi.

“Master, I’m going to Thunder Snake Martial School.”
Godly Sword System.Chapter 14:
For the past few days, Yang Qi had been practicing with his saber in the Jiang City’s parliament, forgetting to eat and sleep.

“Slash Points+ 5.”

“Slash Points+ 5.”

” Slash Points+ 5. “

In five days, he had successfully pulled out 1000 slashes. The Slash Points also reached 7408.

Yang Qi wanted to complete the Super Sky Rank Cultivation Method: the first stage of the Drawing out Sword Millions of Times. It would take some time for him to pull out the blade 10,000 times.

“Senior!”

Suddenly, a panicked voice sounded.

Yang Qi fixed his eyes on it and found that it was Lee Hu.

“What’s wrong?”

He was a little puzzled. The Demonic Devils that attacked the Jiang City had already been destroyed. Could it be that more Demonic Devils had appeared?

“The Yellowstone Mountains has found the corpses of dozens of hunters. We have sent people to investigate, but none of them have returned. I’m afraid that there is a Demonic Devil in the Yellowstone Mountains.”

The Yellowstone Mountains was located in the wilderness outside of Jiang City!

However, there were usually only some wild beasts in the Jiang City wilderness. Hunters occasionally went hunting in the wild.

“Since that’s the case, I’ll make a trip there.”

After saying that, Yang Qi put the Black Iron Wolf Blade back into the sheath on his back and walked out of the Jiang City Conference.

Yellowstone Mountains.

When Yang Qi got to the Yellowstone Mountains, he looked around.

Not long after, He saw the bodies of dozens of hunters and soldiers.

Their state of death was too horrible to look at!

He began to search for traces of Demonic Devils in Yellowstone Mountains.

After a while, Yang Qi arrived at a pond and was somewhat stunned.

This was because a melodramatic plot that only existed in Huaxia novels had appeared.

Someone was bathing in the pond!

Furthermore, it was a girl!

“The water here is really clean.”

A silver bell-like voice sounded.

The girl’s back was facing him. Her back was as white as white jade and she didn’t seem to have noticed Yang Qi’s arrival at all.

Yang Qi was ready to leave hurriedly. If the girl saw him, he wouldn’t be able to clear his name even if he jumped into the Yellow River.

However, just as he took a step forward, an angry voice resounded.

“You dare peek at me while I bath?!”

Yang Qi’s body trembled, and a bitter smile appeared on his face.

When he saw the girl again, she had already put on her clothes.

The girl was very beautiful. Her skin was as white as jade, and she looked about the same size as him. She had a ponytail and was angrily staring at Yang Qi.

“You look like a dog. How dare you peek at me bathing? You must be tired of living!”

Yang Qi looked at the girl and found that she was also a Martial Artist of the Advanced Body Forging Stage.

A Martial Artist of the Advanced Body Forging Stage was a super genius!

After all, she already had 2000Jin of strength at such a young age.

“You’re mistaken. I didn’t peek at you bathing. I came to Yellowstone Mountains to look for Demonic Devils.”

Yang Qi smiled bitterly and explained.

After all, he didn’t want to peek, but he did.

“Demonic Devils!” The girl smiled coldly. “Do you think I will believe you?”

“I understand. I have also discovered those corpses. But do you think that it was a Demonic Devil who killed them? I have been searching this broken mountain for so long, but I have yet to find any Demonic Devil.”

The girl didn’t believe Yang Qi’s words. She felt that with Yang Qi’s age, he shouldn’t even be a Body Tempering Martial Artist. How could he dare to come searching for Demonic Devils?

Suddenly, an evil aura came along with the wind, and a cold laughter sounded out.

Yang Qi and the girl instantly knew that it was the voice of a Demonic Devil!

“Is there really a Demonic Devil here?”

The girl couldn’t believe it. It wasn’t because she was afraid, but because she was surprised. After all, with her Intermediate Body Forging Martial Artist strength, dealing with a Demonic Devil shouldn’t be a problem for her.

After all, in this broken mountain, there was at most only a Primary Demon Soldier.
Godly Sword System.Chapter 15:
This girl’s name was Su Xun’er. After a few seconds of surprise, the Demonic Devil appeared in front of her and Yang Qi.

There was only one Demonic Devil!

This Demonic Devil was tall and big, like an iron tower. It was surrounded by an evil aura, looking really terrifying.

“Intermediate Demon General!”

Su Xun’er’s voice could not stop trembling. She would never have thought that in the wilderness of this small city, there would be an intermediate Demon General.

Looking at the light blue eyes of the Demonic Devil, Yang Qi was also stunned for a few seconds. He also did not expect that it would be an intermediate Demon General.

Su Xun’er, who initially thought that there was only a Primary Demon Soldier, was scared out of her wits at this moment, because it was impossible for her to defeat an intermediate Demon General.

“Run!”

Suddenly, Su Xun’er shouted at Yang Qi. She used all her strength to try to escape from this place.

Yang Qi couldn’t help but laugh, but this was normal. After all, when a Fighter of the Advanced Body Forging Stage met an intermediate Demon General, he had no other choice but to run for his life.

When the intermediate Demon General saw Su Xun’er run away and was about to chase after her, he discovered that Yang Qi was smiling and was slightly stunned.

“Human, what are you laughing at?”

In the eyes of the intermediate Demon General, shouldn’t Yang Qi also start to run away?

“Killing an intermediate Demon General will give me 8000 Slash Points, that’s why I’m laughing.” Yang Qi said.

After his voice faded, Yang Qi pulled out the Black Iron Wolf Blade.

“What a foolish human, you actually want to fight me? You are courting death!”

The intermediate Demon General threw out a punch.

The demonic aura interweaved with the fist energy and attacked Yang Qi.

Yang Qi held the Black Iron Wolf Blade, stared at the incoming demonic energy and fist energy, and shouted coldly.

“Ten Slashes Breaking Waves!”

High rank martial skill, Ten Slashes Breaking Waves!

The blade turned into ten terrifying blade lights, and the terrifying blade lights attacked towards the intermediate Demon General.

The fist energy that was intertwined with the demonic energy was instantly dispersed by the blade light.

The remaining nine blade lights flew towards the intermediate Demon General.

When the intermediate Demon General saw this, he was shocked!

But he realized that he could no longer dodge!

Nine terrifying blade lights slashed heavily on the intermediate Demon General’s body! It did not even have the time to scream before its body turned into ashes!

“Killing intermediate Demon General, Slash Points+ 8,000.”

The system’s voice appeared in Yang Qi’s mind.

Yang Qi thought that a high-level martial skill was indeed powerful. That was much more powerful than the Demon Ox Slash.

Now that he had the Elemental Body and had reached the Combined Level One, as well as the Black Iron Wolf Blade and high rank martial skill, killing an intermediate Demon General was too easy for him.

On the other side.

Su Xun’er ran over a thousand meters in one breath, and from the top of Yellowstone Mountain, she ran to the bottom of Yellowstone Mountain.

She, who came out of Linhai Base City to train, never thought that there would be such a terrifying Demonic Devil in the wilderness of Jiang City.

She also understood what her father had said to her.

“The wilderness is very scary!”

Eh?

Su Xun’er was stunned. She realized that Yang Qi did not follow her.

He should…

She thought about it. He should have been killed by the intermediate Demon General.

“Why are you running so fast?”

A familiar voice entered Su Xun’er’s ears.

Su Xun’er was shocked. She followed the voice and saw Yang Qi walking towards her.

“He actually didn’t die?”

Su Xun’er could not believe it. Could it be…

This person was a Martial Disciple?

Impossible!

Su Xun’er shook her head and dispelled this ridiculous idea.

“Hey, why aren’t you dead?”

When Yang Qi walked to Su Xun’er’s side, Su Xun’er questioned him.

“If I tell you,” Yang Qi thought for a moment. “Would you believe me if I said I killed that intermediate Demon General?”

Su Xun’er looked at Yang Qi disdainfully. “Of course, I wouldn’t believe you.”

“I understand. After I ran away, you also ran away. “But you’re not as fast as me. I guess that intermediate Demon General wouldn’t bother to kill you. That’s why you managed to survive.”

Yang Qi rolled his eyes. He knew Su Xun’er wouldn’t believe him, so he didn’t bother explaining.

“Xu’er!”

Suddenly, a very dignified voice rang in Yang Qi and Su Xun’er’s ears.
Godly Sword System.Chapter 13:
He obtained another Super Treasure Chest?

The corner of Yang Qi’s mouth curled up into a smile.

“You have obtained the Super Sky Rank Cultivation Method: Drawing out Sword Millions of Times.”

“You have obtained a high rank martial skill: Ten Blades Breaking Waves.”

Super Sky Rank Cultivation Method, Drawing out Sword Millions of Times?

Even a high-rank martial skill, Ten Blades Breaking Waves, was considered an ordinary martial skill to Yang Qi. With the Earth Blade Talent, Yang Qi immediately understood it.

“Super Sky Rank Cultivation Method: The Drawing out Sword Millions of Times has merged into your body.”

Yang Qi heard the voice of the system and opened the Property Panel.

Host: Yang Qi.

Age: 17.

Realm: Primary Martial Disciple

Talent: Earth Blade Talent (Evolving Skyblade Talent requires 500,000 Slash Points.)

Constitution: Elemental Body (Evolving Spiritual Body requires 200,000 Spiritual Bodies.)

Weapon: Black Iron Wolf Blade (Evolving Qiuniu Sabre of Red Fire requires 300,000 Slash Points.)

Martial Skill: Ten Blades Breaking Waves, Demon Ox Slash

Cultivation Skill: Drawing out Sword Millions of Times (First stage) If you draw the blade 10,000 times, you will receive 10,000 Ten Blades Breaking Waves.)

Slash Points: 2408

Earth Blade Talent could evolve the Skyblade Talent. Since the Earth Blade Talent could comprehend ordinary saber skills, the Skyblade Talent could naturally comprehend super martial skills.

Spiritual Body!

Yang Qi smiled. If the Elemental Body was the treasured body of a Body Forging and Martial Disciple Level Martial Artist, then the Spiritual Body was the treasured body of the Martial Master and Grandmaster!

After breaking through to the Martial Master realm, the effect of the Elemental Body would almost be gone. Therefore, it was said that the Elemental Body was the treasure body of a Body Refining and Martial Disciple Level.

None of these were important!

The most important thing was the Super Sky Rank Cultivation Method that Yang Qi had obtained, the Drawing out Sword Millions of Times!

The first stage was to draw his saber 10,000 times! After completing the first stage, he would be able to obtain a million Slash Points. One million Slash Points would allow him to evolve his weapon, physique, and Earth Blade Talent!

After all, even if he successfully drew his saber 10,000 times, it would only be 50,000 Slash Points.

What if he went out to kill Demonic Devils in the wild?

That was a foolish idea. The wild was extremely dangerous. Even a Grandmaster realm expert might lose his life in the wild. He was just a Primary Martial Disciple.

Therefore, he could only draw his saber ten thousand times. Fortunately, the Black Iron Wolf Blade could increase the success rate of drawing a saber by 50%.

Thinking of this, Yang Qi revealed an excited expression. Would the path of the strong be far?

“Oh my god!”

“The intermediate Demon General and so many Demon Soldiers are all dead?”

A surprised voice suddenly came over.

Yang Qi looked over and found that it was two Body Refining Martial Artists and dozens of soldiers. They looked as if they had been struck by lightning, shocked to the point of being tongue-tied.

He walked to their side. ” Did you guys discover any more Demonic Devils?”

The two Body Refining Martial Artists and dozens of soldiers came back to their senses and said, “Senior, we didn’t find any more Demonic Devils.”

They looked at Yang Qi in shock. Such a powerful existence was actually standing right in front of them?

He was truly terrifying!

After that, Yang Qi searched with them again. After confirming that there were no Demonic Devils, the two Body Tempering Martial Artist brought Yang Qi to the Jiang City’s parliament.

The Jiang City’s parliament was where all the Martial Artists in the Jiang City were located. The Jiang City originally had a dozen or so Martial Artists, but now there were only four left.

Lee Hu and Wei Qiang returned to the Jiang City’s Gathering after learning that all the Demonic Devils had been destroyed.

The residents of the emergency shelter and those who did not enter the emergency shelter all heaved a sigh of relief. They were able to stay alive.

“Senior.”

Lee Hu and Wei Qiang hurriedly greeted Yang Qi respectfully when they saw that Yang Qi was there as well.

“You know senior as well?”

The two Body Forging Martial Artists were a little shocked.

“Of course, outside the emergency shelter, senior did…”

“He killed a Primary Demon General in North Road, an intermediate Demon General, and more than twenty Primary Demon Soldiers.”

Lee Hu and Wei Qiang took a deep breath, dumbfounded.
Godly Sword System.Chapter 10:
Beginner martial skill Demon Ox Slash?

25000 Slash Points?

All good stuff.

Yang Qi knew that martial skills were divided into beginner-level martial skills, intermediate-level and high-level martial skills. These were normal martial skills, Earth Level Martial Skills and Heavenly Level Martial Skills, which were considered super martial skills.

Yang Qi found out that the beginner-level martial skill, Demon Ox Slash, had appeared in his mind. It seemed like he had directly comprehended this skill.

In an instant, Yang Qi had the Earth Blade Talent. The function of the Earth Blade Talent was to be familiar with any ordinary Martial Skill.

Yang Qi checked the Slash Points again. 34,602.
