A saber light shot out, causing the entire wall to collapse.

Oh my god!

Zhang Dong looked at the collapsed wall with his mouth agape.

Was Yang Qi such a powerful Martial Artist?

“What’s going on?”

Suddenly, the room began to shake violently.

Was the house going to collapse because of Yang Qi’s attack?

“Let’s go, the house is going to collapse!”

Zhang Dong quickly ran out.

Yang Qi also ran out.

He didn’t know whether to laugh or cry. He just wanted to test the power of a Combined Level One. He didn’t expect the house to be destroyed. This had destroyed his foundation.

However, a Combined Level One was just too terrifying. He was actually able to slash out such a terrifying blade light.

“Yang Qi, what should we do now?”

Zhang Dong looked at Yang Qi in shock.

Yang Qi thought for a moment and said, “We have an emergency shelter in Jiang City. Let me send you there first.
Godly Sword System.Chapter 5:
Zhang Dong agreed with Yang Qi’s words in his heart. Being in an emergency shelter was safer than being here.

Zhang Dong, who had lived in Jiang City for many years, naturally knew where the emergency shelter was.

They quickly walked towards the emergency shelter.

Along the way, they encountered corpses of soldiers, Demonic Devils and Martial Artists. The scene was too horrible to look at.

There were only a dozen or so Martial Artists in Jiang City, and there were no Martial-Disciple-Level Martial Artists at all! The number of soldiers in the army was also pitifully small. Currently, Yang Qi could not tell how many Demonic Devils had appeared in Jiang City.

When they arrived outside the emergency shelter, over a hundred soldiers were guarding outside from a discrete position.

When the hundreds of soldiers noticed that Yang Qi and Zhang Dong were humans, one of them asked Yang Qi and Zhang Dong to go and register.

After Zhang Dong finished registering, he realized Yang Qi had no intentions of registering. He looked at Yang Qi with puzzlement.

“Yang Qi, hurry up and register.”

“You can go in. I won’t go in. ” Yang Qi said.

At first, Zhang Dong was stunned. But he soon felt relieved. After all, he knew Yang Qi was a powerful Martial Artist. Yang Qi must have something to do.

“Young man, we are fighting a war with the Demonic Devils right now. If you don’t go in now, you will only cause us more trouble.”

A muscular man appeared in front of Yang Qi.

Yang Qi vaguely felt that this man should be a Martial Artist, but he didn’t know what grade Martial Artist this man was.

The man looked at the sabre at Yang Qi’s back and was slightly stunned.

“Young man, are you also a Martial Artist?”

The hundreds of soldiers were also surprised.

Yang Qi had a sabre at his back, but he was not willing to enter the emergency shelter. It was very likely that Yang Qi was a Martial Artist.

“That’s right. Yang Qi is a Martial Artist, and a powerful Martial Artist at that. Just now, Yang Qi cut down the house with his sabre.”

Zhang Dong, who had yet to enter the emergency shelter, told everyone about how Yang Qi killed the Demonic Devils and destroyed the house with a single slash.

The man and the hundreds of soldiers were tongue-tied when they heard this. If what Zhang Dong said was true, then Yang Qi was a really powerful Martial Artist.

“Hello, my name is Lee Hu, an Intermediate Body Forging Martial Artist.”

Lee Hu stretched out his hand towards Yang Qi.

Yang Qi shook hands with Lee Hu and said, “Yang Qi.”

“Don’t you think it’s funny?”

Suddenly, not far from Lee Hu, a man made a disdainful sound.

“His name is Wei Qiang, and he’s also an Intermediate Body Forging Martial Artist.” Lee Hu introduced him to Yang Qi.

Wei Qiang walked to Yang Qi’s side and looked at him mockingly.

“You killed two Primary Demon Soldiers in seconds and destroyed the house with one slash?”

“Even if you are a Fighter at the Advanced Body Tempering Stage, how could you destroy a house with one slash? Do you think you’re a Martial Disciple who has reached the Weapon Stage?”

Wei Qiang’s face was filled with disdain.

The hundreds of soldiers came back to their senses after hearing what Wei Qiang said. They all felt that what Wei Qiang said made sense.

What Wei Qiang said was not wrong at all. Yang Qi had really reached the Weapon Stage, Combined Level One!

However, Yang Qi didn’t want to explain anything to Wei Qiang. After all, whether Wei Qiang believed him or not had nothing to do with him.

“Why don’t you believe me?”

Zhang Dong was stunned. What he said was true.

After listening to what Wei Qiang said, Lee Hu also felt that what Zhang Dong said just now was not true. After all, Yang Qi was too young. He looked like he was only seventeen or eighteen years old.

“Young man, why don’t you go in?”

Yang Qi naturally wouldn’t choose to enter the emergency shelter. After all, he could obtain the Slash Points by killing Demonic Devils. Currently, the Demonic Devils were engaged in a great battle with the Martial Artists and the army. He didn’t want to miss that opportunity.

“Hehe, there seems to be a lot of humans here.”
Godly Sword System.Chapter 3:
When Zhang Dong heard the sound of the collision, he felt as if he had been struck by lightning.

“There must be a human inside.”

“I also feel that there must be humans inside. Humans are simply too delicious.”

Outside the door, the terrifying voice of the Demonic Devil could be heard.

“Yang Qi, what should we do? I don’t want to die!”

Zhang Dong was drenched in cold sweat, and his whole body was trembling.

Yang Qi gripped his saber, and his gaze was resolute. Now that things had come to this, he could only fight with his life on the line.

Another sound rang out, and the door broke into pieces. Two Demonic Devils appeared in Yang Qi’s field of vision!

The first impression these two Demonic Devils gave Yang Qi was that they were extremely ugly. Their figures were the model of a human, but their bodies were completely black. Their bodies were surrounded by an evil aura, and their eyes were glowing with a faint green light. It made people feel as if they were suffocating.

Green eyes, Demon Weapon grade Demonic Devils.

And the pale green eyes represented these two Demonic Devils. They were Primary Demon Soldier!

“Human, come over and let us eat you.”

One of the Primary Demon Soldier chuckled at Yang Qi and Zhang Dong.

Zhang Dong was scared out of his wits. He was only a breath away from being scared to death.

Although Yang Qi was also scared, he didn’t show it on his face. His eyes were still firm.

He was waiting!

Waiting for the two Demonic Devils to come closer so he could slash down heavily with his sabre! His current physique was an Elemental Body, and his strength was astonishing. He wouldn’t be able to escape anyways, so he could only fight with his life on the line with these two Primary Demon Soldiers!

“Foolish humans, since you aren’t coming over, then we can only go over!”

As he spoke, a Primary Demon Soldier pounced towards Yang Qi.

Yang Qi held the hilt of the sword tightly in his hand. Just as Primary Demon Soldier was about to reach him, he pulled out the rusty Iron Sword and slashed at the Primary Demon Soldier’s head.

Suddenly, a blade light flashed.

What followed next was the miserable cry of the Demonic Devil.

The head of the Primary Demon Soldier, lunging at Yang Qi, had already been chopped off by him.

“Killed a Primary Demon Soldier, Slash Points+ 300.”

The mechanic voice sounded in his mind.

Zhang Dong’s eyes widened. It was as if he had seen a ghost, and his jaw dropped.

The remaining Primary Demon Soldier was frightened. He had never thought Yang Qi could kill his companion with a single slash.

Even Yang Qi was dumbfounded, not to mention them.

After evolving his mortal body into an Elemental Body, he knew that his strength was great, but he wasn’t confident that he could defeat the Demonic Devil.

Moreover, he didn’t expect a Primary Demon Soldier to be so weak that he could instantly kill it.

However, killing Demonic Devils would also allow him to obtain Slash Points.

Yang Qi wanted to obtain 50,000 slash points and evolve the rusty iron sword into a Black Iron Wolf Blade. He looked at the remaining Primary Demon Soldier in front of him and smiled.

When the remaining Primary Demon Soldier noticed that Yang Qi was smiling at him, a chill ran down from the soles of his feet to the top of his head.

“Human, I’m a Demonic Devil!”

Before the Primary Demon Soldier could finish his words, Yang Qi had already struck with his blade. The cold light flashed again, and the Primary Demon Soldier’s head separated from its body.

“Killed a Primary Demon Soldier, Slash Points+ 300.”

Looking at the two Demonic Devils’ corpses, Yang Qi sighed.

Zhang Dong, at the side, returned to his senses only after a long time. He looked at Yang Qi in shock.

“Yang Qi, are you a Martial Artist?”

Martial Artist?

Yang Qi was stunned.

He only had an Elemental Body. He didn’t know if that counted as being a Martial Artist.

He immediately thought of the Property Panel. After opening it, he discovered that his realm had changed.

“Realm: Fighter of the Advanced Body Tempering Stage .”

Yang Qi was a bit surprised, “I am indeed a Martial Artist.”

Yang Qi wondered if he could now be considered a Fighter of the Advanced Body Tempering Stage.

Was this the power of a transmigrator? He didn’t expect that after evolving his mortal body into an Elemental Body, he would immediately become a Fighter of the Advanced Body Tempering Stage.

One should know that he wasn’t an ordinary Fighter of the Advanced Body Tempering Stage, but a Fighter of the Advanced Body Tempering Stage who possessed an Elemental Body. A Primary Martial Disciple had a strength of 4000Jin. Currently, he also has a strength of 4000Jin. The only difference was that while a Primary Martial Disciple could use Essence Energy to attack people from a few meters away, he possessed no Essence Energy.

After getting Yang Qi’s definite answer, Zhang Dong was dumbfounded. A powerful Martial Artist was actually renting in his house for three months?
Godly Sword System.Chapter 2:
Yang Qi was shocked. Was this the system?

As a transmigrator, he naturally knew what a system was.

He was a little excited because ever since transmigrating, he had become a pitiful worker in this world where Demonic Devils roamed freely. Now that he had obtained the system, he did not fail to live up to his reputation as a transmigrator!

However, he did not understand the function of the system.

Blade Drawing System? Could it be used to draw a blade?

Thinking of this, Yang Qi inserted the rusted Iron Sword into its sheath and pulled it out once more.

However, there was no sound in his mind.

He repeated the action a few more times, but there was still no sound.

This made Yang Qi somewhat stunned.

“When pulling out the blade, one must combine essence, energy, and spirit into one in order to receive Slash Points.”

At this moment, he heard the electronic voice in his mind again.

The integration of essence, energy, and spirit?

Yang Qi took a deep breath and looked straight at the ancient sheath in his hand. Then, he slowly pulled out the sabre!

“Slash Point +1.”

“Congratulations to the Host for obtaining a Super Treasure Chest.”

He was somewhat delighted. Finally, he was able to successfully pull out the sabre. He also received a Slash Point and a Super Treasure Chest.

Although he didn’t know what the effects of the Slash Point were, he knew about the Super Treasure Chest.

He opened the golden treasure chest in his mind.

“Obtained 10,000 Slash Points.”

“Obtained Earth Blade Talent.”

Yang Qi had no idea what the effects of the Slash Points and Earth Blade Talent were.

Yang Qi found an icon of a Properties Panel in his mind. He selected to open it.

Host: Yang Qi.

Age: 17.

Stage: Normal.

Earth Blade Talent: Able to familiarize oneself with any ordinary sabre technique.

Constitution: Mortal Body (Consumes 10,000 Slash Points to evolve into an Elemental Body.)

Weapon: Rusted Iron Sword (Consumes 50,000 Slash Points to evolve into Black Iron Wolf Blade.)

Cultivation Technique: None.

Martial Technique: None.

Slash Point: 10,001.

Looking at his own Properties Panel, Yang Qi understood the use of the Slash Point.

To evolve a rusty Iron Sword into a Black Iron Wolf Blade, it required 50,000 Slash Points. He only had 10,001 Slash Points now, so naturally, he wouldn’t be able to evolve.

However, he was able to evolve his physique into an Elemental Body!

Elemental Body!

Of course he knew what an Elemental Body was!

Ever since the appearance of the Essence Energy, some people’s bodies had also undergone a mutation.

Elemental Bodies were the precious bodies of body forging and Martial Disciple Level Martial Artists!

A Primary Body Forging Martial Artist had a strength of 250 kg, an Intermediate Body Forging Martial Artist had a strength of 500 kg, and the Advanced Body Tempering Stage Martial Artist had a strength of 1000 kg. As for the Body Tempering Martial Artist with an Elemental Body, their strength would double.

For example, an ordinary Martial Artist of the Advanced Body Tempering Stage had a strength of 1000 kg, while a Martial Artist of the Advanced Body Tempering Stage with the Elemental Body had a strength of 2000 kg.

A Primary Martial Disciple only had a strength of 2,000 kg.

However, the number of Martial Artists with an Elemental Body was rather few, just like the number of geniuses in fantasy novels.

Yang Qi couldn’t help but get excited when he thought that he could use the Slash Point to evolve his mortal body into an Elemental Body.

He immediately used 10,000 Slash Points to evolve his mortal body into an Elemental Body.

The original 10,001 Slash Points were reduced to just 1 point.

After evolving into an Elemental Body, Yang Qi suddenly felt as if his entire body was as big as a tiger. He even felt as if he could leap up. His bones were as hard as iron, and he felt like a horned dragon.

“Is this still me?”

Yang Qi swallowed his saliva. If he was in his previous world right now, he would definitely be the strongest person in the world.

A loud noise suddenly entered Yang Qi’s ears. The room started shaking like an earthquake!

A few terrifying roars sounded. Which made people feel like suffocating.

This was…

The Demonic Devil’s roar?

Could it be that the Demonic Devils and the army had exchanged blows?

The sound of bullets, explosions, and miserable cries kept ringing in Yang Qi’s ears.

“Yang Qi! Open the door!”

That was the voice of the landlord, Zhang Dong. Yang Qi quickly opened the door and found that Zhang Dong had a shocked look on his face.

“The Demonic Devils have attacked Jiang City!”

Zhang Dong took a few deep breaths before speaking.

“I had just arrived at the station when the Demonic Devils appeared. I wouldn’t have been able to return if I didn’t run fast!”

Yang Qi also started to panic.

He thought he wasn’t even a Martial Artist. He was also afraid that he would have a slim chance of survival if he faced a Demonic Devil.

He could only rely on the newly evolved Elemental Body for now. He didn’t know if he could defeat the Demonic Devil with his current strength.

“Yang Qi, let’s hide here and not go out. We don’t know how many Demonic Devils have appeared in Jiang City. We can only rely on the Martial Artists and the army now.”

Zhang Dong curled up into a ball and trembled.

The sound of bullets, explosions, the roars of Demonic Devils, and screams were still lingering.

Suddenly, there was a knock on the door!

To be precise, it should be the sound of the door being attacked.
Godly Sword System.Chapter 1:
“The Demonic Devil has been found in Jiang City. Dozens of people are reported to have died?”

Yang Qi’s mouth twitched slightly as he read the news on his phone.

It’s been three months since he transmigrated to this world, and he’d been paying attention to every news regarding Demonic Devils. This was a world where Demonic Devils roamed freely. They had even occupied numerous places in the Dragon Country. Eight bases were built to surround the Dragon Country Imperial Capital and defend it against the Demonic Devils in four directions.

Speaking of which, he was rather unlucky. Back home, he tripped and fell to his death while walking, then transmigrated into this world. He had no relatives or friends here and relied on working in Jiang City to support himself.

Now that the Demonic Devils have appeared in Jiang City, let alone working, he didn’t even dare to go out.

Yang Qi smiled bitterly.

“Jiang City is just a small city in the Linhai Base. If the Demonic Devils and the army Martial Artists fought, the Linhai Base would not be able to provide any assistance to the Jiang City.”

He said to himself.

The Jiang City was under the jurisdiction of the Linhai Base, one of the eight bases in the Dragon Country. There were more than a hundred cities under the jurisdiction of the Linhai Base. Jiang City was just one of the pitifully small cities. There were only a dozen Martial Artists and no more than a thousand soldiers in the army.

His concerns were valid. Although Jiang City was under the jurisdiction of the Linhai base, it was still some distance away from the Linhai base. With the Linhai base guarding so many towns, there would be no extra martial artists and troops to help Jiang city.

Yang Qi decided to search the house for any weapons after considering this. In the face of Demonic Devils, it was always better to be armed than to be without a weapon.

After searching for a long time, he still couldn’t find anything.

Yang Qi was somewhat absent-minded. He wasn’t a Martial Artist. It was obvious he couldn’t fight back if a Demonic Devil appeared in front of him.

The world received Essence Energy not long after the Demonic Devils appeared. A portion of humans who could strengthen their bodies to a certain level were able to condense essence energy within their bodies. They further reached a level where they could release the Essence Energy.

There was a clear classification of Martial Artists in this world: Body Tempering Martial Artist, Martial Disciple, Martial Master, Grandmaster, Senior Grandmaster, Primordial General and Ancestor.

Each stage was further divided into primary, intermediate, and advanced stage.

One with a strong physique was a Body Tempering Martial Artist. After condensing essence energy in their body and achieving the release of Essence Energy, they would become a Martial Disciple!

To become a Martial Artist was too difficult. To become a mere Primary Body Tempering Martial Artist one needed to have a strength of 250 kg!

“Yang Qi, are you there?”

Suddenly, a somewhat deep voice echoed in his ear. Yang Qi walked to the door and opened it, revealing a man in his thirties.

The man was his landlord, Zhang Dong.

“Brother Dong, what’s up?”

Yang Qi looked at Zhang Dong in confusion. His relationship with Zhang Dong was quite good.

Zhang Dong sighed. “Yang Qi, Demonic Devils have appeared in Jiang City. I don’t plan to stay in Jiang City any longer. My cousin is a Martial Artist. I’ll be going to Linhai Base soon.”

“Here’s a sabre for you to defend yourself against Demonic Devils. Although this sabre might not be very useful, it’s still better than nothing.”

After saying that, Zhang Dong handed the one-meter-long sabre in his hand to Yang Qi. The sabre was then sheathed into the ancient looking scabbard.

Zhang Dong patted Yang Qi’s shoulder and said, “Good luck.”

Zhang Dong turned around and left right after saying that.

Yang Qi looked at Zhang Dong’s back and then looked at the sabre in his hand. A trace of warmth appeared in his heart.

He also wanted to go to Linhai Base if possible. However, the Linhai Base could no longer accommodate more people. If the people outside wanted to enter, they needed to be Martial Artists to obtain the right of habitation in the Linhai Base.

It was very difficult to become a Martial Artist.

Yang Qi felt it deeply.

He held the sabre in his hand. He thought that since the scabbard was so ancient, then it should be a good sabre.

He drew the knife out without hesitating.

But in the next second, Yang Qi’s facial expression changed.

Because in his hand was a rusty Iron Sword.

Yang Qi’s face twitched. If the Demonic Devils appeared, and he used this rusty Iron Sword against them…

He didn’t dare to think about it anymore. Even if the Demonic Devil got tetanus, it would at most be a mutual destruction.

However, what he didn’t expect was for a mechanic voice to appear in his mind.

“The Host has drawn his sword. The Blade Drawing System is binding. . . “

“Blade Drawing System binding complete.”

Circle of Inevitability.Title: Circle of Inevitability
